results.description: Uses high-coverage momentum field (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_actrtn2m). Applied SUGGESTION1 by selecting a strong single field for clarity; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field); SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.9974); SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount 15, alphaCount 36). Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.78 (well-known short-term momentum signal).

Combines 6-month active return and industry-relative 4-week return to capture medium momentum vs short-term industry moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 (2 fields), SUGGESTION2 not applicable, SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverage >0.7), SUGGESTION4 partly applied (both fields have moderate user/alphaCounts). Implementation kept compact. Confidence 0.72 (diversified momentum).

Mean-reversion signal: stocks with very high 50/200 ratio may be due for pullback. SUGGESTION1 single strong field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 0.9681); SUGGESTION4 limited but present. Implementation short and CS-normalized. Confidence 0.64 (classic mean-reversion but crowded).

Use slope of 52-week price trend to pick trending names. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 0.9575); SUGGESTION4 minimal users but reliable metric. Confidence 0.66 (trend capture).

Price above last 260-day low to identify breakout momentum. SUGGESTION1 single field (coverage 1.0); SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 N/A; SUGGESTION4 low users but simple robust metric. Confidence 0.60 (behavioral breakout).

Longer horizon momentum using 39-week return with lag to avoid microstructure. Applied SUGGESTION1, SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 1.0), SUGGESTION4 not strong. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.68 (consistent momentum horizon).

Use volatility-adjusted 3-year projected EPS growth to favor more stable growth. SUGGESTION1 single fundamental field (mdl77_ohistoricalgrowthfactor_y3sur); SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 0.7936); SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Kept implementation simple. Confidence 0.55 (fundamental forecast risk).

results.idea: Earnings revision momentum (6-month avg FY1 revisions)
results.description: Exploit analyst upward revision momentum using averaged 6-month EPS revisions. SUGGESTION1 single field (coverage 0.9576); SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount 32). No vector ops. Confidence 0.75 (strong signal historically).

Leverage recent earnings surprise scaled by price. SUGGESTION1 single field (mdl77_oearningmomentumfactor_surp); SUGGESTION4 strong (userCount 82, alphaCount 121). Confidence 0.77 (earnings surprises often move price).

Buy stocks with declining short interest (covering) or avoid rising short interest via 12-month change. SUGGESTION1 field mdl77_2400_chg12msip has high coverage/user counts. SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence 0.58 (crowded short signals can persist).

Use skewness of 90-day returns to detect asymmetric upside opportunities. SUGGESTION1 single field (mdl77_pricemomentumfactor_skew90drtn); high coverage and alphaCount. Confidence 0.62 (skewness informative for risk).

Penalize high idiosyncratic residual variance (24-month) to favor stable alphas. SUGGESTION1 field mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_varresirtn (coverage 0.9115). SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.60 (risk control enhancement).

Exploit volatility risk premium via implied-minus-realized volatility. SUGGESTION1 field implied_minus_realized_volatility_2 used (coverage 0.9661). SUGGESTION4 limited users. Confidence 0.65 (option premia informative).

Use difference ATM put vol - ATM call vol as bearish sentiment indicator (buy when negative). SUGGESTION1 used mdl77_voldiff_pc (coverage 0.7896) and/or mdl177_2_liquidityriskfactor_atmputvol. Chose single field for simplicity. Confidence 0.59 (options skew predictive).
Use visibility ratio (recent volume vs 50-day avg) to confirm breakouts. SUGGESTION1 field mdl177_v1_400_visiratio (coverage 1.0). Implementation short. Confidence 0.54 (volume confirmation helpful).

Divide 6-month active return by 6-month moving avg turnover to favor momentum with liquidity. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (actrtn6m and volpre6m) both high coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.70 (momentum + liquidity is robust).

Cross-sectional zscore on 12-month active return to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1 single high-coverage field (mdl77_opricemomentumfactor_actrtn12m). No vector usage. Confidence 0.74 (classic momentum).

Subtract industry-relative 5d return from 50/200 ratio to reduce industry effects. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (p50_200ratio and indrelrtn5d); both high coverage. SUGGESTION4 okay. Confidence 0.67 (better cross-sectional).
Multiply relative momentum by turnover ratio to favor momentum backed by real trading interest. SUGGESTION1 uses actrtn3/6 and volto (turnover). Coverage high. Confidence 0.66.
Pick short-term mean reversion using 5-day industry-relative return (mdl77_2pricemomentumfactor_indrelrtn5d_). SUGGESTION1 single field (coverage 0.9765). Confidence 0.61 (reversal horizon risk).
